execution_plan.description: Extract customer ids and full names from the EU system.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customers.id AS s1__id, customers.full_name AS s1__full_name FROM customers;

execution_plan.description: Extract customer ids and full names from the US system.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customers.id AS s2__id, customers.full_name AS s2__full_name FROM customers;

execution_plan.description: Compare EU and US customer names and return pairs with Levenshtein distance < 2 (likely duplicates). This step performs the pairwise comparison using the extracted name lists from steps 1 and 2.
execution_plan.query:
SELECT
  eu_ids.eu_id AS s3__eu_id,
  eu_ids.eu_full_name AS s3__eu_full_name,
  us_ids.us_id AS s3__us_id,
  us_ids.us_full_name AS s3__us_full_name
FROM
  unnest(ARRAY[$step1.s1__id]::bigint[], ARRAY[$step1.s1__full_name]::text[]) AS eu_ids(eu_id, eu_full_name)
CROSS JOIN
  unnest(ARRAY[$step2.s2__id]::bigint[], ARRAY[$step2.s2__full_name]::text[]) AS us_ids(us_id, us_full_name)
WHERE levenshtein(eu_ids.eu_full_name, us_ids.us_full_name) < 2;
